#include<iostream>
#include<string>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
	int t;
	string num;
	cin>>t;
	while (t--)
	{
		int carry=0;
		cin>>num;
		int len=num.size()-1;
		for (int i=len; i>=0; i--)
		{
			if (num[i]=='7')
			{
				num[i]='4';
				carry=1;
			}
			else
			{
				num[i]='7';
				carry=0;
				break;
			}
		}
		if (carry) cout<<"4";
		cout<<num;
		cout<<endl;
	}
	return 0;
	
}
